item.description:
It was a LONG winter, but riding season is finally here!  Scooters Go Green would like to kick off the season with a bang, Saturday May 21st.   Brought to you by Boston Scoots Boston's scooter club and sponsored by Scooters Go Green... Boston's scooter shop. 

 

3:00PM - 5:00PM  -  Hang at the Shop


@ Scooters Go Green
220 Old Colony Ave
Boston MA 02127
 
Come hang out, kick tires, talk shop!  Fill up on some music and snacks before the ride. Need some accessories?  Great time to get some swag for the new season.  The day of the ride all accessories are 20% off! 

----------------

5:00PM - 7:00PM - RIDE AROUND THE CITY

Leave From:  Scooters Go Green
220 Old Colony Ave
South Boston MA 02127
 
It's been a while since Boston has seen the streets filled with scooters.  Time to kick off the season with a ride through downtown.  Details and maps of the route will be handed out at the pre-party at Scooters Go Green.

----------------

7:00PM - 9:00PM - Huge Party at the Stadium Bar and Grill!!!  FREE FOOD!!! 

Free food and non-alcoholic beverages at the the Stadium Bar and Grill

232 Old Colony Ave
(Next to Scooters Go Green)

  Sponsored by Scooters Go Green, enjoy free Pizza, Burgers and wings at the post ride party.

---------------

VEGAS GIVEAWAY!!!!!

 

One free trip for two will be raffled off at the post party.  Free hotel for two nights, with free companion airfare. 

No purchase necessary, sponsored by Scooters Go Green!

 

 

Questions????  - Give us a call

Scooters Go Green

(617) 269-0050

Steve
item.why: WINTER IS OVER AND ITS TIME TO RIDE
item.name: Summer Opening Ride
